Articles.Content:
Hello!

I finally finished my first KSP music video.

The song was made with FL studio. (which i am no "pro" of, so it took a while to get the audio right for the video)


The story is about a probe sent to earth/kerbin to scan for intelligent life, but when the humans/kerbals are not deemed worthy, the mother ship requests the probe to self destruct so the planets resources can be harvested without conflict. But the space probe malfunctions when it begins to develop feelings for the planets inhabitants.

"I don't mind criticism but try keep it constructive, thank you i made the video for fun, and it was quite enjoyable to do, so yeah enjoy the vid"
